titleInfo.title: Statues of Rameses III, Mortuary Temple of Rameses III

mods.abstract: Mortuary temple statues of Rameses III (New Kingdom - Dynasty XX); Osiride mummy form statue holding ankh in crossed arms with column of hieroglyphs and cartouche down legs (left); kilt clad statue with balled fists and leg left extended (right); both statues wear hedjet crown and false beard, broken on left statue; rows of bound captives and hieroglyphic inscriptions underneath human leg (behind statues); untitled print, "559" in pencil on back of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

subject.topic: Temple of Ramses III (Medinet Habu Site, Egypt)

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
